summary: quick fix to add some of the dragonborn weapons and armor to lorecraft database. The books are mainly to keep all that clutter out of the smith.
descriptionHtml: i didn't make lorecraft i just made the books. credits to dat arcanesmith. If anyone wants me to change or update this just let me know. This mod adds books for dragonbone weapons armor, chitin armor, and bonemold armor. my ocd can't take them in my blacksmith. Please let me know if this mod doesn't work for you guys and I'll continue to work on it as well as lorecraft for the other sets like immersive weapons and skyre
author: Chu
